WorkItem.Description: I see no items at all in the Direct Upgrades list in 2.2.0b1
WorkItem.Summary: Direct Upgrades view shows nothing in 2.2.0b1

Comments.Message:
What model is this in? Mage?

Looks like in the Mage model, if a slot is empty, no upgrades show for it... Any idea what's up with that Kavan?
I was using the HolyPriest model.  No empty slots.

Your comment on empty slots got me playing around with them.  I started get some "Direct Upgrades" showing when I emptied a slot.  If I instead used a very poor item in the slot, I would see fewer upgrades.  I found that Heroic 5 man loot would almost always end up filtering out the best heroic raid loot.  For example, setting my headpiece to the "Cowl of the Dire Troll" (H DTK) results in the "Hood of Rationality" (H EoE) showing up as a 9.52 point upgrade.  I suspect the points for the currently equipped item are being counted twice.
As of the latest beta (2.2.0b4) most upgrades are still hidden.  Load any decently geared priest from the Armory and select the "Direct Upgrades" view in the comparisons pane to see this behavior.
